resources.string:
• Improved counter offer dialog
  • Added \"Problem\" and \"On Hold\" status indicators to work orders
  • Ability to choose which contact to dial
  • Enabled Android O support
  • Enhanced payments information
  • Fixed other small bugs

• Fixed crashes caused by rotating the phone while uploading photos
  • Fixed app getting stuck in retry loop while downloading files
  • Bullet points now show up in work order descriptions

• New look and feel
  • More work order search options
